description: From Oxford dictionary's 2022 word of the year 「goblin mode」. Meaning 「unapologetically self-indulgent, lazy, slovenly, or greedy」, 「rejecting social norms or expectations」.

examples.chinese: 哥布林模式,就是过着不修边幅,享乐主义生活的状态
examples.translation: Goblin mode is living a life of slovenliness and hedonism.

examples.chinese: 自我放纵,懒惰,已经处于哥布林模式
examples.translation: Self-indulgent, lazy, already in goblin mode.
